input.sentences: the family poses together before their thanksgiving dinner .
the food is set up on the counter .
the children have their own table .
after eating the men gather in the living room .
the kids are tired after their large meal .
output.sentences: We always start Thanksgiving doing family poses.
We then set all the food for the feast on the counter.
The children have a table all their own.
We adults then gather in the living room and begin eating.
When we are tired after the meal the kids play games.
